FuncDef:
The http-hostcar enable command enables the Hostcar function and the fast-reply function on HTTP packets of forcible web users.
The undo http-hostcar enable command disables the Hostcar function and the fast-reply function on HTTP packets of forcible web users.
By default, the Hostcar function on HTTP packets of forcible web users is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Disables the fast-reply function on HTTP packets of forcible web users.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a scenario where the forcible web authentication is enabled in a pre-authentication domain, run the http-hostcar enable command to prevent the high CPU usage when the interface board is attacked by HTTP packets of forcible web users.
Configuration Impact
After the command is configured, the bandwidth of forcible web users that is used to send HTTP packets to the CPU is limited by the hostcar command in the slot view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
